name: A Rabbit's Adventure
description:
When Jake's Golden Carrot goes missing Snowflake has to go find his carrot and be careful along the way. Also inspired by Telltale Games.  (Obviously)

So basically, this was just a test game I made back in 2020. This game was originally gonna have four episodes but the game never got any more episodes besides one because the game was barely even recognized. So the game only ended up getting one episode.

This game is available on Gamejolt and Scratch.
